name: immuno-workers
description: A website for immune workers looking for jobs

scripts.start_mongo: npm run stop_mongo && npm run cleanup && mkdir -p var/mongo-db var/log/mongodb; mongod --dbpath var/mongo-db --logpath var/log/mongodb/mongod.log --fork; mongo data/localdb.js
scripts.push: git push && git push heroku master
scripts.local: npm run start_mongo && nodemon — exec "heroku local web" — signal SIGTERM
scripts.remote: git add . && heroku push master && heroku open
